author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mologen Reaches Key Strategic Milestones And Successfully Implements Capital Measures In 2017
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Mologen AG:
* DGAP-NEWS: MOLOGEN REACHED KEY STRATEGIC MILESTONES AND SUCCESSFULLY IMPLEMENTS CAPITAL MEASURES IN 2017
* CONFIDENT OUTLOOK FOR FULL YEAR 2018 * CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS AMOUNTED TO EUR6.5 MILLION AS OF 31 DECEMBER 2017 (31 DECEMBER 2016: EUR20.5 MILLION)
* IN 2017, RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT EXPENSES AT EUR14.0 MILLION AND WERE THEREFORE DOWN YEAR ON YEAR (PREVIOUS YEAR: EUR17.0 MILLION)
* FY EBIT IMPROVED TO EUR-18.7 MILLION (PREVIOUS YEAR: EUR-21.0 MILLION) Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
